summary: CAR LOSSES POWER WHILE IN MOTION. FRIST TIME NEAR MY HOME.  SECOND TIME WHILE DRIVING IN TOWN.  STOP, TURN OFF MOTOR THEN BACK ON AND MESSAGE IS GONE.  MY CAR HAS DONE THIS TWICE NOW.  DO NOT TRUST MY CAR TO DRIVE FAR FROM HOME. THROTTLE BODY ASSEMBLY IS HAVING ISSUES AND UNDERSTAND IT'S BEEN RECALLED ON A DIFFERENT FORD CAR BUT NOT EXPLORER. MOST LIKELY SAME THROTTLE ASSEMBLY!
